item.title: Ratatan update Descent of the Dark Ratatan! is launching on Christmas Day
item.content:encoded:
Those of you who are playing and enjoying Ratatan are going to get an extra present on Christmas Day, as Ratata Arts and publisher Game Source Entertainment have announced a free update for the game. Ratatan’s Descent of the Dark Ratatan! will be released on December 25th, adding a new chapter, the use of Dark Cobuns in battle, and way to exchange unwanted prizes for new prizes. All the details can be found after the trailer which shows the Descent of the Dark Ratatan content.

Here are the listed of the Ratatan’s Descent of the Dark Ratatan!

  • NEW Chapter Two Unlocked: A new chapter will be unlocked after completing World 5 offering new areas to explore and new gameplay challenges to enjoy.
  • NEW Dark Ratatan Battles: Command Dark Cobuns against high-level bosses with unique mechanics.
  • NEW “Duo Ratakaruta”: When the elemental power of multiple attributes reaches a certain level, players may obtain a powerful “Duo Ratakaruta.”
  • NEW Feature “Goddess Gacha”: Players can exchange unwanted weapons, accessories, and items for points to spin for new prizes. Players also have a chance to obtain limited items.
  • NEW Multiplayer Improvements: Added new features for joining random rooms and refreshing room lists. Optimized the lobby for faster and more stable random matchmaking.
  • NEW Legendary Accessories: New rarity level with random “Decorune Effects” added.

Ratatan Early Access Review – Rhythm-action warfare is the best kind of warfare

Earlier this year, Dom reviewed the Ratatan Early Access release saying, “Ratatan is exactly what I wanted it to be. In Early Access this is a fresh, modern take on Patapon’s iconic action with an invigorating visual design and awesome soundtrack. All I want now from the journey to 1.0 is even more of this.”

Source: Press Release



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/12/17/ratatan-update-descent-of-the-dark-ratatan-is-launching-on-christmas-day/
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl gets a free content update called Stories Untold
item.content:encoded:
GSC Game World has released brand new and free content for STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl called Stories Untold, and it adds approximately five hours of new content to discover. Those five hours encompass eight new missions, six new characters, seven new locations, three new items, and a new weapon which is the GP37V2 rifle, a modified version of the GP37 rifle.

In STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl Stories Untold a mysterious transmission is broadcasting which is giving stalkers headaches and hallucinations. In this story chain, you can make decisions on how to help the scientists trying to resolve this mystery, and find the source of the transmission. The mission becomes available after leaving the Zalissya region, and can be picked up on the PDA anywhere though the highest chance of is by the Burnt Forest. You will also have the option to create a new hub within the Burnt Forest. The Stories Untold update has also brought some new fixes and those are listed as follows:

  • Fixed an issue where multiple artifacts could spawn in one place.
  • Optimized multiple mutant models.
  • Fixed an issue where NPC could not find a way to the shelter during an Emission at the Cement Factory location.
  • Fixed an issue where NPC could not find a way to the shelter during an Emission in Zalissya.
  • Fixed an issue that could cause massive mutant hordes to spawn at the Plant location of the Garbage region.
  • Adjusted dead zone settings for DualSense controller on PC.
  • Fixed an issue where the player could obtain the Heart of Chornobyl artifact from the regular anomalies.

STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl Stories Untold is available on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series XS.

Source: Steam



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/12/17/stalker-2-heart-of-chornobyl-gets-a-free-content-update-called-stories-untold/
